answerList: The program on top is wrong and won't work.
In the program below, Thymio's bottom LEDs change color only whenever the two bottom sensors detect nothing at exactly the same time.
In the program on top, Thymio's bottom LEDs change color whenever first the right sensor detects nothing and then the left sensor detects nothing.
In the program on top, Thymio's bottom LEDs change color whenever first the left sensor detects nothing and then the right sensor detects nothing.
In the program on top, Thymio's bottom LEDs change color whenever any of the two sensor detect nothing.
